00056

00089

00281 /* Plugin include? */
00282 #if defined(__orxPLUGIN__)
00283 
00284   #ifdef __orxEMBEDDED__
00285 
00286     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT /* Compiling embedded plug-in => API doesn't need to be imported */
00287 
00288   #else
00289 
00290     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT orxDLLIMPORT /* Compiling plug-in => API needs to be imported */
00291 
00292   #endif /* __orxEMBEDDED__ */
00293 
00294 /* External include? */
00295 #elif defined(__orxEXTERN__)
00296 
00297   #ifdef __orxSTATIC__
00298 
00299     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT /* Linking executable against orx static library */
00300 
00301   #else /* __orxSTATIC__ */
00302 
00303     #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT orxDLLIMPORT /* Linking executable against orx dynamic library */
00304 
00305   #endif /* __orxSTATIC__ */
00306 
00307 /* Internal (library) include */
00308 #else
00309 
00310   #define orxDLLAPI orxIMPORT orxDLLEXPORT /* Compiling orx library => API needs to be exported */
00311 
00312 #endif

00316 #define orxALIGN(ADDRESS, BLOCK_SIZE)   (((ADDRESS) + ((BLOCK_SIZE) - 1)) & (~((BLOCK_SIZE) - 1)))
00317 
00318 #define orxALIGN16(ADDRESS)             orxALIGN(ADDRESS, 16)
00319 #define orxALIGN32(ADDRESS)             orxALIGN(ADDRESS, 32)
00320 #define orxALIGN64(ADDRESS)             orxALIGN(ADDRESS, 64)

00323 /* Padding macro */
00324 #ifdef __orxPADDING__
00325 
00326   #ifdef orxPADDING_SIZE                /* Padding size defined */
00327 
00328     #define orxPAD(SIZE)                orxU8 au8Pad[orxALIGN(SIZE, orxPADDING_SIZE) - SIZE];
00329 
00330   #else /* orxPADDING_SIZE */           /* Padding size not defined */
00331 
00332     #define orxPAD(SIZE)                /* No padding applied */
00333 
00334     #warning orxPADDING_SIZE is undefined : its value should be a power of 2!
00335     #undef __orxPADDING__
00336 
00337   #endif /* orxPADDING_SIZE */
00338 
00339 #else /* __orxPADDING__ */
00340 
00341   #define orxPAD(SIZE)                  /* No padding applied */
00342 
00343 #endif /* __orxPADDING__ */

00351 #define orxFLAG_TEST_ALL(X, F) (((X) & (F)) == (F))
00352 
00358 #define orxFLAG_TEST(X, F) (((X) & (F)) != 0)
00359 
00365 #define orxFLAG_GET(X, M) ((X) & (M))
00366 
00372 #define orxFLAG_SET(X, A, R)  \
00373 do                            \
00374 {                             \
00375   (X) &= ~(R);                \
00376   (X) |= (A);                 \
00377 } while(orxFALSE)
00378 
00383 #define orxFLAG_SWAP(X, S) ((X) ^= (S))
